leaderboard.description: Shows a leaderboard around a player on a server sorted by total score, time played or score/min.
leaderboard.syntax:
``$leaderboard <sorting method> <player name>``
Sorting Methods: ``score``, ``time`` played and ``min``.
Abbreviation: ``lb``
leaderboard.notes: You can ommit the sorting method and just give the player name, it will then show a leaderboard sorted by score.

map.description: Shows a graph of the most used maps in a server over the last day, week or month.
